unittitle_ssm: Kenneth Crowe Papers
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
International Brotherhood of Teamsters, Chauffeurs, Stablemen, and Helpers of America
subject_ssm: Labor unions -- Elections -- New York (State) -- New York.
heading_ssm: Kenneth Crowe Papers

unittitle_ssm: Carey campaign for 1991 IBT presidency general elections: mailers, campaign day articles; articles and materials related to the apparent rebirth of teamsters and loosing of mob control within the union; court documents: transcripts, exhibits, submissions, ect.; 1986 report to the President and the Attorney General: "The Edge: Organized Crime, Business and Labor Unions."
heading_ssm: Carey campaign for 1991 IBT presidency general elections: mailers, campaign day articles; articles and materials related to the apparent rebirth of teamsters and loosing of mob control within the union; court documents: transcripts, exhibits, submissions, ect.; 1986 report to the President and the Attorney General: "The Edge: Organized Crime, Business and Labor Unions."
